message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation.
Your offer was a bit too steep for me. How about this split?
Ok Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer accounts for the time pressure too.
Time is running out, Alice. I need a bigger slice of the pie to agree to a deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offers are more than fair considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  50/50 is the fairest deal. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
